### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found)
-  Inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and another inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
Not enough information to determine the structure

### Electricity generator at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=117.5 y=-30.5), boiler(position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and another transport belt at position(x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
* Errors when using entities without fuel
  - Make sure to provide fuel to entities that require it, such as burner mining drills and boilers
* Errors when using entities without ingredients
  - Make sure to provide ingredients to entities that require them, such as stone furnaces
* Errors when using entities that are not connected
  - Make sure to connect entities that require connection, such as steam engines to boilers
* Errors when using entities that are not plugged into the electric network
  - Make sure to plug entities into the electric network, such as electricity groups

### NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent
* No important variables have been assigned by the agent
